item.title: Apple Gets $280 Price Target From JPMorgan Amid iPhone 17 Buzz: Retail Stays Optimistic
item.description: JPMorgan now estimates that Apple will ship approximately 236 million iPhones in fiscal year 2026, representing a 2% year-over-year increase.

item.title: xAI Reportedly Secures $10 Billion Funding, Pushing Valuation To $200 Billion
item.description: The funding follows reports in July that xAI was in talks to raise fresh capital at a similar valuation.
